text: Interviewer
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

──By the way,
I have something to ask!

How did everyone
find out about us?
Haha, I have no idea!
Even if it was by chance......

I’m really happy that
you found us and are with us now......

I’m so happy,
I really think so♡

Today's stage......
is this one time only......

Our time with everyone here......
is just now......

So until the end......
let’s have fun together......!
Please listen......
(Asahi)
(Fuyuko)
(Mei)

......After all,
it has to be these three.

I’m really glad
everyone is in Straylight.

Oh, a chance encounter!
That’s another amazing miracle!!!
A "miracle" huh......

......If that’s the case, thank you
for everyone meeting each other.

And thank you
for meeting me that day.
